lore: Crackling with power stolen from those they slay, Fulgurite Electro- Priests are fanatical cultists of the Machine God. With their heavy, copper-bound staves, they smite blasphemers that waste the Motive Force, leeching it from heretic warriors and harnessing the holy energy in their capacitors where it empowers their voltagheist field.
